name: Ailien
description:
Entry for the Godot Wild Jam #12!

Hack ships to refill your energy and use them to fight the enemy forces!

Your protégé aliens are under siege from evil humans!
You play as an AI developed by aliens to defend their planet.
Without an energy source, you can't last long out in space - but fear not!
Your systems are able to hack the enemy ships!

Tip:
Playing with game pad is recommended but not mandatory, keyboard works too!
